overview: In The Sex Files, a secret organization maintains sex files on not so average citizens. Alex Kincaid does unearthly things with Kyle McKenna in the Jacuzzi. Cutter West has a close encounter with Max Grand. Kyle McKenna shows up again when Drew Andrews shows him what an alien probe feels like. Max Grand returns with Eric York plus newcomers Brock McKay and Dillon Colt to have a four-way past the doorway to the sex dimension!
title: The Sex Files
